text: “Gamoo seeni” isheedhaan jedhameYeroma isa argitu haroo isa seetee mogolee ishee lamaan irraa saaqxe[Suleymaan] ni jedhe: “Dhugumatti, inni kun masaraa mucuceeffamaa daawwitii irraa ta’ee [bishaan keessaan mul’atuudha].” [Isheenis] “Gooftaa kiyya! Ani lubbuu kiyya miidheeraSuleymaanii wajjin Allaah Rabbii aalama hundaa ta’etti harka kenne (Islaamawe)” jette
